name: European Poultry, Egg and Game Association
goal: EPEGA is the European Poultry, Egg and Game Association. We are representing the interests of the EU's egg, poultry and game producers, wholesale business and foreign trade in these commodities. Traceability, food safety,animal welfare and quality controls are of major importance for the members of the association.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: TTIP, WTO, International Trade, Common Agricultural Policy, Food and Feed Safety, Animal Health, Veterinary measures
